traits.Aura of Terror: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.
traits.Tactical Discipline: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.Multiattack: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.
actions.Mace: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.
actions.Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires: Ranged Spell Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
